Enabling the world to see in 3D

Zeg.AI is working on a proprietary technology by leveraging deep learning to create stunning 3D visualizations.

Explore

Bring 3D Objects to Life

Due to fundamental challenges in dealing with 3D representations, creating digital 3D objects is still hard, time consuming and requires specific skills. Our focus at Zeg.ai is to democratise creation of 3D models using deep learning.

Seamless Object Export

We understand that sharing of your 3D creations is equally important for you. So whether you're building an app or showcasing your talent, we allow you to share your 3D models via a public link or .obj format.

Realtime Object Creation

Our technology ensures that the 3D object creation happens in real-time so you don't have to wait to see and share your creations.

Create 3D model for your AR/VR application today

It's free, fun and an exciting way to generate 3D content. For more details, write to us at contact@zeg.ai
